entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy in the evening. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 18 March 2023
